name: Practise
description: **Getting Started with Angular** - Refer the URL: [https://www.npmjs.com/package/newman] - node --version - npm --version - npm install -i newman     - g - global     - i - local to the folder - ng --version

scripts.test: newman run Fake-RestFulBooker.postman_collection.json --insecure -d testdata.csv --reporters cli,json,junit,html --reporter-json-export ./results/outputfile.json --reporter-junit-export ./results/ --reporter-html-export ./results/htmlreport.html -r htmlextra,confluence --reporter-htmlextra-export ./results/htmlextrareport.html --reporter-htmlextra-browserTitle "My Newman report"   --reporter-confluence-export ./results/template-default.wiki

author: Veeresh Bikkaneti
